author: davidb
msg: Remove the register="*" functionality from the osgi.serviceloader capability as this functionality can be achieved by leaving out the directive.
This fixes one failing test on the OSGi ServiceLoader Mediator CT.
Also added a script to prepare and copy the ServiceLoader jar to the CT.
